pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access 'Care Quality Commission' Data // Access data from the 'Care Quality Commission', the health and adult social care regulator for England. The 'Care Quality Commission' operates an API https://www.cqc.org.uk/about-us/transparency/using-cqc- data#api, with data available under the Open Government License. Data includes information on service providers, locations such as hospitals, care homes and medical clinics, and ratings and inspection reports.
